client_id.description: Internal database ID of the client

client_uid.description: The unique identifier (UID) of the client

opt_out_transactional_sms.description: The opt out status of the client for transactional SMS messages. When true, the client will not receive transactional SMS notifications.

preferred_language.description: The client's preferred language code (e.g., 'en', 'es', 'fr'). Can be null if not set.

effective_language.description: The calculated effective language for the client, considering their preference and the business default

created_at.description: Timestamp when the settings were created

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the settings were last updated

x-vcita-business-rules.opt_out_behavior: When opt_out_transactional_sms is true, the client will not receive appointment reminders, booking confirmations, or other transactional SMS messages
x-vcita-business-rules.default_settings: New clients have opt_out_transactional_sms set to false by default
x-vcita-business-rules.effective_language_calculation: If preferred_language is set, it is used. Otherwise, the business default language is used.

description: Client-level settings such as communication preferences and opt-outs.
